title: Voting by absentee voter at polls prohibited
context: ยง15-11 Voting by absentee voter at polls prohibited. Any person having voted an absentee ballot pursuant to this chapter shall not be entitled to cast a ballot at the polls on election day. An absentee voter who does cast a ballot at the polls shall be guilty of an election offense under section 19-3(5). [L 1975, c 36, pt of ยง3 ; am L Sp 2008, c 4, ยง2]
